programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: Walter Garber is a New York City subway dispatcher whose ordinary day is thrown into chaos by an audacious crime: the hijacking of a subway train. Ryder, the criminal mastermind behind the hijacking and leader of a highly-armed gang of four, threatens to execute the train's passengers unless a large ransom is paid within one hour. As the tension mounts beneath his feet, Garber employs his vast knowledge of the subway system in a battle to outwit Ryder and save the hostages. But there's one riddle Garber can't solve: even if the thieves get the money, how can they possibly escape?

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance

Helena Bonham Carter voices Siveth, the ice breathing dragon who was once banished from the kingdom for failing to save the king's life. Compelled by the young man's cause, she emerges from hiding, using her fantastical powers on the trio's adventurous journey which brings revelations and rewards beyond vengeance. programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: A fast paced, edge of your seat thrill ride. FBI agent Flynn is on a mission: transport a federally protected witness from Hawaii to Los Angeles so the government can put a brutal mob boss behind bars. But, just as the plane reached 30,000 feet, hundreds of venomous snakes are unleashed, causing violent mayhem as the vicious predators attack everyone in sight. With the help of L.A.'s leading snake expert on the ground, Flynn leads the other passengers on a desperate, action-packed fight for their lives.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A deep-sea submersible part of an international undersea observation program has been attacked by a massive creature, previously thought to be extinct, and now lies disabled at the bottom of the deepest trench in the Pacific with its crew trapped inside. With time running out, expert deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is recruited by a visionary Chinese oceanographer, against the wishes of his daughter Suyin, to save the crew and the ocean itself from this unstoppable threat: a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark known as the Megalodon. What no one could have imagined is that, years before, Taylor had encountered this same terrifying creature. Now, teamed with Suyin, he must confront his fears and risk his own life to save everyone trapped below bringing him face to face once more with the greatest and largest predator of all time.

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Join Diane Keaton, Bette Midler and Goldie Hawn in this sinfully satisfying revenge romp about a trio of first wives who team up to teach their lying, cheating ex-husbands a lesson. Ivana Trump's galvanising cameo - 'don't get mad, dahlinks, get everytink' - sets the scene in a comedy that hinges on the self-mockery of its ageless stars. Midler's ball-busting shtick, Keaton's ditsy vulnerability and Hawn's eternal youth are just light-hearted grist for the mill of female friendship as a serious source of strength.
